title: Every Other Day
description: Every other day, Kali D'Angelo is a normal sixteen-year-old girl. She goes to high school. She argues with her father. She's human. But every other day... she's not.Though she's not quite sure what she is on those days, Kali knows what she does – she hunts, traps, and kills demons, hellhounds, and other supernatural creatures that threaten her world. On those days, she is practically indestructible.But when Kali notices a mark on a popular girl at school, she knows instantly that the girl is marked for death by one of these unworldly beings. And she knows she only has twenty-four hours to save her.There's only one problem – it's the wrong twenty-four hours.
author: Jennifer Lynn Barnes
